Pesan Tito Karnavian ke Idham Azis: Jadi Kapolri Nggak Gampang
01 Nov 2019, 04:32 by Friski Riana, Amirullah
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Mantan Kapolri Tito Karnavian mengatakan akan ada banyak pekerjaan yang harus dikerjakan Kepala Kepolisian RI Jenderal Idham Azis.
"Jadi Kapolri enggak gampang, karena internal saja harus ngurusin 450 ribu orang. Eksternal ada 34 polda, 500 lebih polres, hampir 5 ribu polsek yang tersebar di seluruh wilayah. Kemudian melaksanakan tugas pokok pemeliharaan kamtibmas, sambil juga pelayanan kepada publik," kata Tito di Istana Negara, Jakarta, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
Tito mengatakan, penegakkan hukum tidak mudah dilakukan di Indonesia yang pluralis dan demokrasi yang cenderung bebas. "Jadi permasalahan idologis, politis, pilkada tahun depan 270 daerah itu akan banyak sekali," ujar Tito.
Selain itu, Tito menyebut pekerjaan Idham adalah mengatasi permasalahan kejahatan-kejahatan konvensional seperti perampokan, begal, kekayaan negara, illegal logging, illegal fishing, hingga masalah lingkungan. "Kompleks sekali. Saya merasakan tiga tahun tiga bulan merasa cukup berat," kata dia.
Idham telah resmi dilantik sebagai Kapolri oleh Presiden Joko Widodo atau Jokowi hari ini di Istana Negara, Jakarta. Ia menggantikan Tito Karnavian yang diangkat sebagai Menteri Dalam Negeri.
Idham merupakan lulusan Akademi Kepolisian 1988. Lelaki kelahiran Kendari, Sulawesi Tenggara, 30 Januari 1963 ini dikenal berwawasan di bidang reserse dan antiteror. Jabatan terakhir Idham Azis adalah sebagai Kepala Badan Reserse Kriminal Mabes Polri.

Tito Karnavian's message to Idham Azis: Becoming Chief of Police Is Not Easy
01 Nov 2019, 04:32 by Friski Riana, Amirullah
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Former National Police Chief Tito Karnavian said there would be a lot of work to be done by Indonesian Police Chief General Idham Azis.
"So the National Police Chief is not easy, because internally it must take care of 450 thousand people. Externally there are 34 regional police, 500 more police stations, nearly 5 thousand police officers scattered throughout the region. Then carry out the main task of maintaining Kamtibmas, while also serving the public," said Tito at the State Palace, Jakarta, Friday, November 1, 2019.
Tito said that law enforcement is not easy to do in a pluralist Indonesia and a democracy that tends to be free. "So there will be a lot of ideological, political, regional elections next year, 270 regions will be overwhelming," Tito said.
In addition, Tito said that Idham's work is to overcome the problems of conventional crimes such as robbery, begal, state wealth, illegal logging, illegal fishing, to environmental problems. "It's very complex. I feel three years and three months feel quite heavy," he said.
Idham has been officially inaugurated as National Police Chief by President Joko Widodo or Jokowi today at the State Palace, Jakarta. He replaces Tito Karnavian who was appointed as Minister of the Interior.
Idham is a graduate of the Police Academy in 1988. This man, born in Kendari, Southeast Sulawesi, January 30, 1963, is known to be knowledgeable in the field of investigation and anti-terror. Idham Azis' last position was as Head of the Indonesian Police Headquarters Criminal Investigation Agency.
